item.title: Curated list of R resources available online
item.description: Main sources of resources Comprehensive R Archive Network: CRAN Manuals Contributed manuals and cheat sheets Journals R journal Journal of Statistical Software JOSS Books Bookdown RStudio Website: https://www.

item.title: Animations in R: Time series of erythemal irradiance in the St. Lawrence
item.description: The “need” for animations As part of my PhD thesis, I am currently characterizing the intensity of multiple stressors in the estuary and gulf of St.

item.title: Add icons on your R plot
item.description: Introduction Icons are very popular on websites to improve the visual grepping (i.e. visual optimization of eyeball search). We all know how to go at the top or the bottom of a website clicking on chevrons ( ).

item.title: Make your R plot Hylian
item.description: Below are presented the 5 steps you need to make your plot a Hylian one! May the triforce be with you! Open R and download the font The Triforce font is available on line.

item.title: List of R packages to create and edit plots
item.description: Note that the list of packages below would be updated as soon as we find a new package. If you know a package that should be in the list, please feel mention it in the comment section below.
